price: Kandi uzatege amatwi umunsi uhamagara (Malayika uzavuza impanda), azahamagarira hafi.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
